dialogues.text: Murderer! Katrina slings the rock -- strikes Lady Van Tassel in the head, a glancing blow that knocks her down.  Katrina runs Katrina grips Young Masbath, helping him up... But, Lady Van Tassel scrambles up, grabs Katrina and thro her back to the ground. Lady Van Tassel steps hard on Katrina's ankle, touches he forehead, bleeding, pissed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been a naughty girl. Young Masbath leaps to action, charging head first -- sla into Lady Van Tassel, sends her backwards. Katrina runs and pulls Masbath up.  They flee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod! Lady Van Tassel rolls, recovering, not very concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod comes out the open front doors... hearing... KATRINA (o.s.)  (far away)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod! Ichabod climbs back on the coach, taking off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katrina and Young Masbath run out from a line of trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we are! BEHIND IN THE FOREST, Lady Van Tassel rides her white hor in no hurry.  Wind kicks hard.  HOOFBEATS are HEARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run, Katrina!  Fast as your pretty legs will carry you.  It makes no difference. ON THE LAWN, Ichabod drives towards Katrina and Masbath. Behind, at the tree line, Lady Van Tassel holds up the Horseman's skull, wind tossing her dress and hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing will stop him now! At mid-field, Ichabod reaches Katrina and Masbath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Climb up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lady Van Tassel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.  Hold on. With Katrina and Masbath on board, Ichabod turns the coac Katrina unties Masbath's hands.  HOOFBEATS GET LOUDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Olly-olly oxen-free! Ichabod looks back towards Lady Van Tassel. At the treeline, the Horseman breaks into the open, hell horseback.  Full speed ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Christ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The coach hits the long straight road, away from the hous Katrina and Masbath hold on as the coach shakes violently

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do not know.  Away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here he comes! Behind, the Horseman can be seen on the forest bordered r Closing fast.  Breakneck pace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might make it to the church. Masbath takes a lantern, crawls back to the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Masbath... ! He ignores, reaching the rear of the coach and throwing t lantern at the Horseman.  It smashes on the trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it, boy, get back here! Young Masbath slides back.  Katrina helps him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can we do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the reins. Young Masbath takes them.  Ichabod slings Van Ripper's ri over his shoulder and starts back.  Katrina grips him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Masbath is right.  We must do something. She releases.  Ichabod gets to the luggage area at the re struggling to open a storage box. Behind, the Horseman draws his sword, closer. Ichabod opens the box, hefting out a long, jagged SAW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod! Ichabod looks.  The Horseman rides up, swinging... Ichabod recoils -- THWACK -- just missed by sword. The Horseman lets the coach get ahead, shifting to the other side of the trail... coming along side. Ichabod backpedals, looking to Masbath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep him off!  Block him! Masbath guides the horses over.  The Horseman must fall behind to avoid the wheels. The coach hits a large, fallen tree trunk. Ichabod bounces, falling... He hangs off the side of the coach. Katrina climbs to offer her hand.  Ichabod offers the saw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it! Katrina takes the saw.  Now with both hands, Ichabod trie for better purchase.  He grips the coach door.  It opens. Ichabod clings to the open door as branches slam him. He's reaching to the coach threshold, reaching... Ichabod pulls himself inside. BOOM -- the door hits a tree trunk, bashed to pieces. Ichabod looks out from the coach, dazed.  He climbs. Katrina looks back as Young Masbath guides the coach to b the Horseman again. The Horseman sheaths his sword, riding... reaching to gri the back corner of the coach. The Horseman dismounts, clinging, climbing... Ichabod takes the rifle off his shoulder, aiming... BANG! -- splattering the Horseman's hand point blank.  Th Horseman hangs on with his other hand. The Horseman re-grips with the blasted hand, amazing sinc it's now all mush and bone. Ichabod throws the rifle on his way to the driver's perch taking the saw from Katrina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move forward! Katrina looks to the horses, then at Ichabod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! Ichabod takes the reins from Young Masbath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help her. Reins in one hand and saw in the other, Ichabod waits.  T Horseman rises up and moves in, taking out his sword. Young Masbath climbs down to the wooden pole connecting t coach to the bridles, puts out his hand.  Katrina takes i Behind, the Horseman swings.  Ichabod blocks with the saw Young Masbath guides Katrina as she leaps onto one horse. Bareback.  Young Masbath straddles the horse beside her. The Horseman swings, backhanded knocks the sword from Ichabod's hand as Ichabod falls back... Ichabod hits the bridle post, hanging onto straps for dea life.  His feet drag on the trail. Above, the Horseman comes to the driver's perch, close en to kill Katrina.  He raises his sword... Katrina screams, ducking, helpless... Below, Ichabod pulls a bolt from the coach's hitching-rod He shoves off with his feet. The Horseman swings.... missing. The horses detach from the coach, dragging Ichabod along. The coach careens out of control. It flies off the trail, hits an incline and sails off, throwing the Horseman. The coach hits a tree trunk and SMASHES. FURTHER DOWN THE TRAIL, the coach horses stop.  Young Mas and Katrina climb off as Ichabod gets to his feet, hurtin clutching his previously wounded shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I doubt that's the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The church.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves too fast. Ichabod unhooks a lantern off the bridle rail.  The trail behind is silent, till a bone chilling SCREECH is HEARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His horse. They start moving.  Ichabod looks around.  He sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There... Through the tree line, the Hollow's massive windmill can seen against the sky.  Katrina and Young Masbath run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod, Katrina and Young Masbath book into this open ar heading to the windmill.  Another HORRIBLE SQUEAL echoes. Ichabod looks over his shoulder. Heavy, low hanging BRANCHES and VINES at the forest edge creep to life, parting... forming a sort of black tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's coming! The Horseman gallops out, throwing leaves in his wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry! The Horseman readies a battle axe. Ichabod gets under the windmill, helping Young Masbath up ladder and in.  Katrina next. The Horseman is almost there. Ichabod follows Katrina.  He gets in, feet dangling.  The Horseman dismounts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod leaps up and struggles with the heavy trap door.. slams it.  He closes the latch just as the Horseman hits. The door buckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It won't hold. Ichabod goes to a large GRINDSTONE against a wall.  He struggles to roll it. Young Masbath helps him roll it to the trap door.  It fal on top with a thud.  The Horseman's sword jabs up through grindstone's center hole. The sword withdraws.  A POUNDING begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Horseman chops at the door with his axe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POUNDING CONTINUES.  The grindstone shifts.  Katrina and Young Masbath back away.  Ichabod holds his lantern up, desperate for ideas, searching. Above, to the right, is the milling platform, where grain ground and bagged.  To the left is the crooked staircase. Ichabod picks up a bailing hook, a plan forming.  He give his lantern to Katrina and points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up those stairs.  Open the door to the roof and wait. Katrina and Young Masbath obey.  Ichabod crosses and clim the ladder to the milling platform.  He grasps a wooden lever, pulling it.  Gears above begin to turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The windmill's rotors CREAK to life, spinning. UNDER THE WINDMILL, the Horseman keeps chopping.  His axe exposes grindstone, throwing sparks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katrina looks down from the stairs. The Horseman's axe pries at the seam of the trap door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep climbing.  I will follow... Ichabod pulls bags of grain, lining them up at the edge o the milling platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hopefully. ABOVE, Young Masbath reaches the ceiling, throws open the door to the roof. BELOW, Ichabod cuts holes into the grain bags, so milled grain spills out and falls to the floor, creating dust. He grabs one open bag and dumps it.  More grain dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Masbath and Katrina come out.  Rotors spin behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod sees below... the Horseman sticks a hand through, trying to push the grindstone aside, then withdrawing.  T RACKING axe continues.  Won't be long. Ichabod grabs one half-full bag of grain, swings it with effort, throws... The bag smashes on the grindstone, busting the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The grindstone falls through, SLAMMING the Horseman down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod slices into a sack hanging from a pulley system. More and more dust rises. Below, the Horseman enters.  Katrina shouts from above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out! The Horseman moves toward the ladder milling platform lad but Ichabod grabs it, pulling it up... The Horseman just misses the final rung. Ichabod throws the ladder aside as the Horseman backs off Ichabod looks to the staircase.  No way to climb down fro the milling platform and get there. The Horseman runs and leaps, grabbing a hanging chain... The Horseman climbs the chain, swinging... Ichabod runs across the platform, jumps... Ichabod grasps the frail rail of the staircase, barely. The rail creaks, about to break.  Behind, the Horseman la on the milling platform. Ichabod is losing grip.  Young Masbath races down the sta grabs his hand.  He pulls Ichabod up. Ichabod's pistol slips from its holster and falls. Ichabod and Young Masbath look... The Horseman, following Ichabod's lead, runs across the milling platform and leaps... Grabs the staircase rail, only a few feet from Ichabod an Masbath.  Ichabod kicks the rail, breaking it... The Horseman falls in billowing dust, crashing below. Ichabod pushes Masbath up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katrina helps them onto the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly, close it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. (takes lantern, points)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get to the crest of the roof and be ready to jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jump?  Jump where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Horseman runs, agile, up stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ichabod shepherds Katrina and Young Masbath to the edge w the rotors spin close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blades will carry us to the ground. Face front and wait for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I can't do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have no choice. Ichabod moves back to the trap door. Katrina and Young Masbath look at the rotors, and down at long distance between them and the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be ready... Ichabod throws the lantern into the windmill and runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Horseman continues up.  The lantern falls past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Masbath jumps.  Ichabod grips Katrina and jumps... They hit one rotor and cling to the frame and cloth.  The rotor begins its downwards swing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lantern hits the ground and shatters.  FLAMES EXPLODE Grain dust is consumed instantaneously -- FLAMES ROAR upwards, filling the windmill... Engulfing the Horseman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rotor is halfway to its lowest point.  Masbath, Katri and Ichabod hang on as the entire structure trembles. BOOM -- flames shoot out the windows, doors and seams, lighting up the night. On the rattling rotor, Ichabod struggles to hold the fram with one hand and keep a grip on Katrina. Masbath drops.  Ichabod releases Katrina, then drops. They hit the ground.  Ichabod rolls, gasping, holding his shoulder.  They all look at each other in disbelief a mom Ichabod lets out a sort of rasping laugh, standing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... come on... Ichabod ushers them across the field, uphill.  Running. Lightning flashes across the sky.  THUNDER RUMBLES. A bolt strikes the windmill, and it EXPLODES... SHOCKWAVE DEAFENING.  The rotors bust apart.  Splinters o burning wood spin all directions. ACROSS THE FIELD, Ichabod, Katrina and Young Masbath keep running.  There is a WOODEN CART parked ahead. IN THE WINDMILL RUBBLE, the Horseman rises, shoving off burning debris.  His flame-ravaged uniform smolders. ACROSS THE FIELD, Ichabod stumbles onwards, but notices something horrible... In the distance, Lady Van Tassel's white horse roams free

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as this registers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no... Young Masbath and Katrina are just past the cart when Lad Van Tassel rises from behind it, swings a plank... SLAMS Ichabod in the chest and sends him down. Lady Van Tassel grabs Katrina's hair, drags her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should have stayed away, Constable. Ichabod gets up slow, furious, reaches to his holster, on to find it empty.  He moves forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep back, or I kill her. She takes out scissors, holds them to Katrina's neck. Katrina ceases struggling. Ichabod keeps Masbath behind him, keeps his distance.  La Van Tassel shoots a glance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See him... Par off, the Horseman strides from the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot kill what is already dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... yes.  I think I will... Lady Van Tassel spins and throws Katrina in the cart, sho against it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! The cart rolls downhill.  Ichabod moves forward. Lady Van Tassel turns, brandishing the scissors, slashing missing.  Ichabod backs off. DOWNHILL, the cart picks up speed, headed for the Horsema The Horseman starts running to meet it. UPHILL, Lady Van Tassel grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say goodbye to her. Lady Van Tassel lunges, stabbing.  Ichabod avoids, puts a his fury behind his fist -- punches her in the face. Lady Van Tassel hits the ground and her bag falls open, sending the Horseman's skull rolling out... The skull rolls... rolls... landing far away. DOWNHILL, Katrina leaps out from the cart... She lands hard... The Horseman shoves the empty cart aside, still on the mo UPHILL, Ichabod sees the skull.  He runs towards it. Lady van Tassel grabs Ichabod by the ankle.  He falls. DOWNHILL, Katrina runs back.  The Horseman is catching up UPHILL, Ichabod tries to pull f ree from Lady Van Tassel. Young Masbath comes behind her - BAM - hits her in the he with the wooden plank.  She's out. Ichabod scrambles to his feet. DOWNHILL, the Horseman catches Katrina, taking her by the hair as she falls to her knees and screams. UPHILL, Ichabod runs... grasps the Horseman's skull. He runs towards the Horseman and Katrina. DOWNHILL, Katrina struggles, but the Horseman holds her r by her hair... raises his sword... UPHILL, Ichabod throws the skull...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horseman! The skull spins through the air... The Horseman drops Katrina, reaches up... Catches the skull. Katrina runs. Ichabod runs to meet her, grabs her as she falls, exhaust Together, they back away from the Horseman. The Horseman holds the skull out, then brings it to his shoulders, to its rightful place.  THUNDER POUNDS. TRANSFORMATION begins -- blood and flesh rise up from the Horseman's throat and grip the skull. Young Masbath drops the plank, watching in awe. The Horseman's reformation continues.  Muscle forms.  Liq become solids.  He is made whole once more, the same evil human face we saw in Baltus' stories. He looks to Ichabod and Katrina, touches his restored fac Daredevil rides up, SCREECHING.  The Horseman replaces hi sward and climbs into the saddle. He rides towards Katrina and Ichabod, but passes them by. They are so exhausted they fall down. Young Masbath backs up as the Horseman comes, but the Horseman does not want him either. The Horseman leans to grab Lady Van Tassel's unconscious form, pulls her up across Daredevil's back. He rides away with her. Ichabod and Katrina watch him go.  They look at each othe then kiss gratefully. Ichabod looks to Young Masbath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tired. Ichabod smiles and holds out his arm.  Masbath comes over Group hug.  Lightning brightens the farmland around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOOFBEATS.  The Horseman enters the clearing, keeping a h on Lady Van Tassel.  Ahead, the twisted tree awaits. Lady Van Tassel is awakening, face bloody.  She turns her head and looks forward.  She screams. The twisted tree's wound opens, wide and glowing. Daredevil picks up speed... Daredevil leaps just as a lightning bolt blasts down, striking the Horseman. For an instant, Horseman and horse are transformed, SKELE OF LIGHT, entering the tree. Silence and smoke.  At the tree, Lady Van Tassel's hand sticks out from the tight-shut suture. The sewn wound on her palm seeps blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bright, busy day in New York.  A coach pulls up to Ichabod's home.  Ichabod is the driver.  He gets off, goe and opens the coach door.  He helps Katrina down.  Next, Young Masbath sticks his head out. Ichabod goes about unloading bags.  Katrina holds Young Masbath's hand, and they look down the street in wonder.
